main event: Observation of an unidentified aerial object made on 15 Jan 61 at Cannon AFB, New Mexico.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 10 to 20 seconds., Only one object was observed., Initial conclusions suggested the object was probably an aircraft or Venus., Witness accounts varied on the color of the observed object., There were three people who confirmed seeing the object during the observation.
witness description: First witness was an air police airman; the second witness described the object's color as pink and then bright red; the third witness required glasses to see but did not observe the object.
